price: 27. Sesungguhnya mereka (orang kafir) itu mencintai kehidupan (dunia) dan meninggalkan hari yang berat (hari akhirat) di belakangnya.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi yuḥibbūna al-ʿājilata wayadharūna warāahum yawman thaqīlan
